name: relogcl

stmt.origin: eqeltrrd(cfv(clog, c0), cr, cfv(cres(clog, crp), c0), wcel(c0, crp))

comment: Closure of the natural logarithm function on positive reals. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 25-Nov-2007.)
